# Fireworks AI

Use `fireworks-ai/<model>` with VoltAgent's model router.

## Quick start

```ts
import { Agent } from "@voltagent/core";

const agent = new Agent({
  name: "fireworks-ai-agent",
  instructions: "You are a helpful assistant",
  model: "fireworks-ai/accounts/fireworks/models/deepseek-r1-0528",
});
```

## Environment variables

- `FIREWORKS_API_KEY`

## Provider package

`@ai-sdk/openai-compatible`

This provider uses the OpenAI-compatible adapter.

## Default base URL

`https://api.fireworks.ai/inference/v1/`

You can override the base URL by setting `FIREWORKS_AI_BASE_URL`.

## Provider docs

- https://fireworks.ai/docs/
